meanings.definition: Covered with woolly or downy hairs.
meanings.sent1: The lanose sheep had a soft and fluffy coat.
meanings.sent2: The lanose fabric felt warm and cozy against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The lanose teddy bear looked like it could use a haircut!
meanings.sent4: The lanose clouds in the sky resembled cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The lanose kitten was a delight to pet with its velvety fur.

meanings.definition: Resembling wool in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The lanose blanket was so soft and comforting.
meanings.sent2: The lanose clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent3: The lanose sweater made him look like a walking sheep!
meanings.sent4: The lanose rug added a cozy touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The lanose pillow felt like a cloud when she rested her head on it.
